column4: Unique identifier for the Work Package / Investigation.
Human-readable title of the investigation or work package.
Overall description of objectives, scope, and scientific rationale of the work package.
Institution responsible for leading this investigation / WP.
Main scientific or administrative contact (name, email, ORCID if available).
Funding programme and grant identifier (e.g. Horizon Europe MSCA, Grant No.).
Identifiers of studies (DC-level) associated with this investigation.
